snippet.title: What is Angular? (Explained for Beginners)
snippet.description:
When you're just starting out you are probably wondering "What is Angular exactly? When you ask that question it leads to a lot of concepts that are over your head and don't make sense. So in this video I really want to cover what exactly Angular is and why it's even necessary... all from a beginners point of view.

*** DOWNLOAD THE FREE REPORT ***
For my free report on the five best programming languages in 2019 (for beginners) go to: https://andysterkowitz.com/report

This Angular tutorial teaches you the fundamentals of Angular and TypeScript.

SUBSCRIBE FOR MORE VIDEOS!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWv7vMbMWH4-V0ZXdmDpPBA?sub_confirmation=1


TABLE OF CONTENT 

00:00 Introduction
02:54 What is Angular?
04:54 Architecture of Angular Apps
08:41 Setting Up the Development Environment
11:25 Your First Angular App
13:50 Structure of Angular Projects
20:43 Webpack
23:57 Angular Version History 
27:31 Course Structure
31:55 TypeScript Fundamentals
32:34 What is TypeScript?

37:57 Declaring Variables
42:46 Types
48:29 Type Assertions
51:15 Arrow Functions
52:59 Interfaces
56:54 Classes

01:18:15 Modules

01:47:34 Services

01:59:22 Generating Services Using Angular CLI

snippet.title: Why is Angular? (Eternal questions)
snippet.description:
When you're just starting out you are probably wondering "What is Angular exactly? When you ask that question it leads to a lot of concepts that are over your head and don't make sense. So in this video I really want to cover what exactly Angular is and why it's even necessary... all from a beginners point of view.

*** DOWNLOAD THE FREE REPORT ***
For my free report on the five best programming languages in 2019 (for beginners) go to: https://andysterkowitz.com/report
